definition: A description or account of the sequence of events leading up to and following an incident, typically involving an accident or mishap. It is commonly used in reports, investigations, or legal proceedings to provide a detailed narrative of the accident's circumstances and progression.

examples.english: The course of the accident is still being investigated.
The exact sequence of events of the accident is unclear.

examples.german: Der Unfallhergang wurde von Zeugen beobachtet.
examples.english: The course of the accident was witnessed by bystanders.
The police are reconstructing the sequence of events of the accident.

examples.german: Der Unfallhergang wurde auf Video festgehalten.
examples.english: The course of the accident was captured on video.
